ai-pli-tv-pvr2.11:1.1_0: One consents to physical contact with the four kinds of succession, one commits an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.11:1.2_0: The four offenses entailing suspension are a condition for the body.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.11:1.3_0: they may be failure in morality ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.11:2.1_0: curd that they have asked for, if they eat in a misfortune, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.11:2.2_0: curd that he himself was asked for, he commits an offense entailing acknowledgment.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.11:3.1_0: The third sub-chapter on failures is finished.
